item.title: Language Dynamics Journal Club
item.description: A (very) approximately fortnightly reading group devoted to the study of language variation and change from an interdisciplinary perspective. This page records a list of the interesting papers read. Upcoming meetings TBA TBA Past meetings (archive) 11/03/2021 McElreath, R. (2020) The Golem of Prague. In Statistical rethinking: a Bayesian course with examples in R and Stan (2nd ed.), 1–18. Boca Raton, FL: CRC Press. 18/02/2021 Daniels, D., Barth, D. & Barth, W.
